com.meteorcode.pathway.logging

Interface LogDestination

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheLog, LogTee, NullLogger, SysOutLog, UtilLogWrapper

    public interface LogDestination
    A generic logger destination, which may accept Strings. Created by xyzzy on 8/19/14.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void log(java.lang.String message)
      Log a String to this destination with default context
      void log(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String message)
      Log a String to this destination with the given context tag
      void log(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Log a message with context and Throwable attached.
      void log(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Log a String, with optional Throwable (such as an exception), and default context to this destination.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String message)
        Log a String to this destination with default context
        Parameters:
        message - the String to log

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String tag,
       java.lang.String message)
        Log a String to this destination with the given context tag
        Parameters:
        tag - The context tag to label this log with
        message - The message to log

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String message,
       java.lang.Throwable t)
        Log a String, with optional Throwable (such as an exception), and default context to this destination.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to log
        t - The Throwable to add to the log

      • log

        void log(java.lang.String tag,
       java.lang.String message,
       java.lang.Throwable t)
        Log a message with context and Throwable attached.
        Parameters:
        tag - The context tag to label this log with
        message - The message to log
        t - The Throwable to add to the log
